title: V/A - Our Band Could Be Your Life (Unofficial Soundtrack)
description:
Unoffical soundtrack by Michael Azerrad's book "Our Band Could Be Your Life: Scenes from the American Indie Underground 1981-1991". 

It's phenomenal, go get it:

1. Black Flag - American waste
2. Black Flag - Drinking and driving
3. Minutemen - Search
4. Mintemen - Case closed
5. Mission of Burma - Outlaw
6. Mission of Burma - That's how I escaped my certain fate
7. Minor Threat - Seeing red
8. Minor Threat - Screaming at a wall

10. HÃƒÂ¼sker DÃƒÂ¼ - Broken home, broken heart
11. The Replacements - Careless
12. The Replacements - Stuck in the middle
13. Sonic Youth - Death valley '69
14. Sonic Youth - Star power
15. Butthole Surfers - Human cannonball
16. Butthole Surfers - Julio Iglesias
17. Big Black - Stinking drunk
18. Big Black - L dopa
19. Dinosaur Jr. - Repulsion
20. Dinosaur Jr. - Little fury things
21. Fugazi - Bad mouth
22. Fugazi - Margin walker
23. Mudhoney - Flat out fucked
24. Mudhoney - Burn it clean
25. Beat Happening - Foggy eyes
26. Beat Happening - Hangman

Compiled by David Snusgrop @ metalbastard.tumblr.com
